channel.title: About the Signal category
channel.link:
.. Proposals to the SuperUMAn DAO can be made in this category to obtain feedback. If the post receives 5 likes, it can then pass to the formal proposal stage. If the proposal has not received 5 likes after 7 days then the topic will be closed. Anyone can make a proposal. Proposals will be announced on the Discord #proposal-announcements channel. Signal proposals should be numbered with SUDAO-IP. An example is given in SUDAO-IP 0 *note that before a proposal is posted on Discourse, it is recommended to start a discussion in the #proposals channel of Discord to gain initial feedback.* Fri, 21 Jan 2022 12:31:27 +0000 Signal About the Signal category mhairi

Proposals to the SuperUMAn DAO can be made in this category to obtain feedback.

If the post receives 5 likes, it can then pass to the formal proposal stage.

If the proposal has not received 5 likes after 7 days then the topic will be closed.

Anyone can make a proposal. Proposals will be announced on the Discord #proposal-announcements channel.

Signal proposals should be numbered with SUDAO-IP. An example is given in SUDAO-IP 0

note that before a proposal is posted on Discourse, it is recommended to start a discussion in the #proposals channel of Discord to gain initial feedback.
